title: Dream Vacation Spots
name: Dream Vacation Spots
description:
A Map by Bscott19

These are the places I want to visit in the future!

properties.name: Chicago, IL.
properties.description: Posted by Bscott19Chicago is a great city full of plenty of stuff to do. You can get some chicago style pizza or grab a hot dog at a cubs game. You can also visit the cool looking Millenium Park.

properties.name: Cozumel, Mexico
properties.description: Posted by Bscott19Cozumel, Mexico is a gorgeous place to visit. It has a wide variety of activities to do, such as scuba diving, horseback riding and swimming with dolphins. If none of that stuff interests you, then its a great place just to relax on the beach.

properties.name: Hilton Head Island, SC
properties.description: Posted by Bscott19Hilton Head Island is a wonderful place to visit. It has a beautiful beach and the community makes you feel right at home. You can do anything from exploring the island on bikes to visiting Harbor Town.

properties.name: Kiawah Island, SC
properties.description: Posted by Bscott19Kiawah Island is one of the most relaxing places in South Carolina. It has a gorgeous beach and nice golf courses. A good thing about its location is the fact that it does not take long at all to travel to Charleston where you can explore the city.

properties.name: Maui, Hawaii
properties.description: Posted by Bscott19Maui is a gorgeous island. It is filled with many different activities to do. You can go to the beach, go explore the island, look at waterfalls, or go shopping. Maui is one of the most beautiful parts of Hawaii.

properties.name: New York City, NY
properties.description: Posted by Bscott19New York City is a fun filled city with plenty of things to do. You can do anything from visiting China Town to going to a Broadway play. This city never sleeps.

properties.name: Rome, Italy
properties.description: Posted by Bscott19Rome is an amazing place. Full of history and wonder, this is a city where you can see anything from Roman architecture such as the Colosseum to more Spanish roots such as the Spanish Steps. It is a romantic place to visit where you can toss a coin in the Fontana di Trevi and hope that your wish comes true.

properties.name: San Francisco, CA
properties.description: Posted by Bscott19San Francisco is located in the northern part of California. It is a gorgeous city which is less congested than the L.A. area. You can visit the Golden Gate Bridge or visit Pier 39 for some fun entertainment and rides.

properties.name: Sydney, Australia
properties.description: Posted by Bscott19Sydney is one of the most visited cities of Australia. It is on the coast, so it is easy to be in the city one minute and on the beach relaxing the next. It is a gorgeous place full of adventure and excitement.

properties.name: Venice, Italy
properties.description: Posted by Bscott19Venice, Italy is one of the most spectacular places you could ever visit. It is the city on water. Its amazing buildings and water ways make the city come alive. You can explore the city and admire at all the shops and buildings or you can take a nice romantic gondola ride on the canal. Either way, it will make for a beautiful vacation!
